General.Name: Sinosun Tech
General.Description: SinoSun Technology Co. Ltd. develops and sells bank-to-business mobile service platforms, payment security products, and paper grain anti-counterfeiting technology. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
